comprehensive_overview: Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences. It is particularly well-suited for aligning sequencing reads of DNA sequences, such as those generated by high-throughput sequencing technologies.
core_features: Ultrafast alignment of sequencing reads to long reference sequences
Support for gapped, local, and end-to-end alignment modes
Alignment and mapping of DNA sequencing reads
Scalability for large genomes and datasets
